title: Olivia Rodrigo - SOUR Album Trailer
author: Olivia Rodrigo
description:

This weekend, fans across the nation witnessed a sneak peek of SOUR on the big screen exclusively in IMAX on a very special Mother's Day presentation of Lin Manuel Miranda's In The Heights.

localize.title: Olivia Rodrigo - SOUR アルバムトレーラー
